it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.view.component
Class CardShadowView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.FrameLayout
              it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.view.component.CardShadowView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, CardViewInterface
public class CardShadowView
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
implements CardViewInterface

Compound View for Shadow Component.

It is built with base_shadow_layout xml file. You can customize this component. See https://github.com/gabrielemariotti/cardslib/tree/master/SHADOW.md for more information.

You can customize it with your style files. Please see card.shadow_image style.

Also you can use a custom layout for Shadow Component in your xml layout.
